summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between block 13, University Addition, and block 2, Boetzki's University Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue Northeast and 8th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7344, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
